获取链表中第index个节点的值。如果索引无效，则返回-1。index从0开始: Get the value of the index-th node in the linked list. If the index is invalid, return -1.
在链表的第一个元素之前添加一个值为val的节点。插入后，新节点将成为链表的第一个: Add a node of value val before the first element of the linked list. After the insertion, the new node will be the first node of the linked list.
将值为val的节点追加到链表的最后一个元素。: Append a node of value val to the last element of the linked list.
在链表中的第index个结点之前添加值为val的节点。如果index等于链表的长: Add a node of value val before the index-th node in the linked list. If index equals to the length of linked list, the node will be appended to the end of linked list. If index is greater than the length, the node will not be inserted.
如果索引index有效，则删除链表中的第index个结点。: Delete the index-th node in the linked list, if the index is valid.
